metadata.dc:title: Japanese dreams VS COVID-19 emergency
metadata.dc:creator: Elia Mazzi
metadata.dc:subject: Effort
Travelling abroad
Interview
metadata.dcterms:abstract: This is an interview to Elia Mazzi, who experienced the quarantine in Tokyo. There are also photos attached, made by Elia Mazzi.
metadata.dc:description: Un viaggio tanto desiderato verso il Giappone, in cerca di una dimensione per se stesso. L'intervista a un ragazzo che ha vissuto la quarantena a Tokyo.
A long-desired travel to Japan in search of a dimension for himself. The interview to the guy that experienced the quarantine in Tokyo.
